QuestData.Title: Overpowered
QuestData.Description: The Sunreaver forces have grown more powerful recently. I suspect magic to be at play here, but I can't be certain.$b$bI think it would be wise to investigate their camp to see if you can find the source of this extra power.$b$bOnce you find it, use this crystal to overload and destroy it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 7 Sunreaver Mana Collectors around Dawnseeker Promontory.
